urls.description: This collection brings together ten of the most distinguished feminist scholars whose work has been celebrated for its excellence in helping to lay the foundation of feminist communication and media research. This edited volume features contributions by the first ten renowned communication and media scholars that have received the Teresa Award for the Advancement of Feminist Scholarship from the Feminist Scholarship Division (FSD) of the International Communication Association (ICA): Patrice M.

tweets.text: #ica21 What's your verdict? I have seen more presentations than at any other ICA I have attended since 2010. I love the 7-8 minutes, it's a great length, especially if there is a longer paper to read. Comfortable navigation and short videos @icahdq
I love the platform. I repeat please don't ever do another conference without this platform. @icahdq #ica21

I support the ideas voiced elsewhere that this platform would be such a great hybrid addition to a shorter in-person conference focusing on fostering actual science collaboration. Imagine! #ica22 #ica21
can I finish watching/commenting on #ica21 presentations AND finish marking/2nd marking dissertations today? ü§î
#ICA21 Research highlight: Media Audiences' Emotions #polcom #ica_pol https://t.co/3coAi717mu

On this last day of #ica21, I would like to highlight my other talk called "A Comparative Privacy Research Framework", which was developed within the comparative #privacy research network (with @Think_Macro @_kquinn_ Carsten Wilhelm, @lutzid & @lbaruh). 

Thread ‚¨áÔ∏è (1/n) https://t.co/dlBDsHzZCD

@LSawyerED @bzelizer @PeterVorderer @claesdevreese @raratan Happily joining the #ica21danceparty!!üéàüï∫ #ica21 https://t.co/rqNitm7cRB

A bit sad that today is the last day of #ica21, but luckily the videos will remain viewable for 60 more days! ü§© Massive thanks to @icahdq for creating such a brilliant online platform, I will fondly look back on my first ICA conference!
Also a big thank you to anyone who watched my presentation or who may watch it in the upcoming weeks. Feel free to contact me if you would like to discuss my research! üòä #ica21

Worth mentioning that Fals Borda and Paulo Freire have recently been appointed by @bsousasantos as two of the main sources of his Epistemologies of the South (The End of Cognitive Empire, 2018).

Get 20% discount for #ICA21 and read it now (see previous post)

#ica21 Loved the panels on Global South methodologies and closing plenary on the role of care in resisting Empire. As we reimagine @icahdq as a space for care, hybrid formats & regional hubs are crucial to decolonizing knowledge through listening, dialogue, and collaboration.
@pisotalus @venlakuu @IraVirtanen @LassiRikkonen Onnittelut #ica21 tunnustuksesta ‚ú®@pisotalus @venlakuu @IraVirtanen @LassiRikkonen @TampereUni

Unfortunately, #ICA21 is ending today. I can't be more satisfied with my first attendance at the @icahdq conference. It has been an incredible experience and such an honour. Special thanks to @brigitte_h_ for all her support üôåüèºand @IPKW_univie for fostering young scholars üéì(1/2)

During this #ICA21 trip, I have learnt so much from all the diversity at the conference and members. It‚Äôs also so pleasant to experience this sense of community and such engaging and interactive feedback. I hope I can repeat next year! üôèüèº(2/2)
